text:
<@U05D5QEBWS3> I think you’re looking for this documentation: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/serverless-functions>

Indeed, from the serverless (non-projects) docs the link goes to the Overview of the JS Building Blocks and should go to the link I’ve posted above. This link is also shown on the Appendix page of CMS-JS docs.
